html: | Kunal Chowdhury | Kunal Chowdhury var loaded=false,__g_isMobile=false,scrolled=false;var ms=1000; navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/webOS/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/iPod/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/BlackBerry/i)||navigator.userAgent.match(/Windows Phone/i)?__g_isMobile=1:__g_isMobile=0;try{__g_isMobile&&window.location.href.includes("m=0")&&(window.location.href=window.location.href.replace("m=0","m=1"))}catch{}try{!__g_isMobile&&window.location.href.includes("m=1")&&(window.location.href=window.location.href.replace("m=1","m=0"))}catch{}
